query:
SELECT 
                    c.id,
                    c.name,
                    c.color,
                    COALESCE(COUNT(s.id),0) as "session_count!",
                    c.last_used_at
                FROM category c
                LEFT JOIN session s ON c.id = s.category_id AND s.user_id = $1
                WHERE c.created_by = $1
                GROUP BY c.id
                ORDER BY COALESCE(COUNT(s.id),0) DESC
